snippet: The moves leave the rookie Bryce Petty as the Jets’ only healthy option behind Ryan Fitzpatrick for next week’s season opener against Cleveland.
abstract: Football Roundup; New York Jets release veteran quarterbacks Josh Johnson and Matt Flynn, despite injury to Geno Smith; other notable player releases and NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: The moves leave the rookie Bryce Petty as the Jets’ only healthy option behind Ryan Fitzpatrick for next week’s season opener against Cleveland.

headline.main: Jets Cut 2 Quarterbacks, Leaving Rookie as Backup
